sentences.en: ...rapping the glass with the knuckles of his right hand.
sentences.cn: …用他右手的指关节敲击玻璃。

sentences.en: ‘Come on,’ he rapped impatiently.
sentences.cn: “得了吧。”他不耐烦地厉声说道。

sentences.en: a popular rap song
sentences.cn: 一首流行说唱乐歌曲

sentences.en: Anthrax have hooked up with Public Enemy for a metal/rap version of "Bring On The Noise"
sentences.cn: 炭疽乐队和公敌乐队联手合作了重金属加说唱版的歌曲《带来噪音》。

sentences.en: Every member contributes to the rap, singing either solo or as part of a rap chorus.
sentences.cn: 每个成员都参与到说唱中来，或者独唱，或者表演说唱乐中的和声部分。

sentences.en: FA chiefs could still face a rap and a possible fine.
sentences.cn: 足协高层可能还要受到训诫并被处以罚款。

sentences.en: He said statisticians gave them a bad rap by "lying with figures".
sentences.cn: 他说统计学家“用数据说谎”，败坏了他们的名声。

sentences.en: Her favorite music was by Run DMC, a rap group.
sentences.cn: 她最喜爱的音乐是RunDMC说唱组合的音乐。

sentences.en: I heard a rap on the door.
sentences.cn: 我听到有轻轻的敲门声.

sentences.en: Mary Ann turned and rapped on Charlie's door.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·安转过身急敲查理的门。

sentences.en: New Yorkers rap about parties and clubs, I rap about car chases and guns.
sentences.cn: 纽约人在说唱音乐中表现晚会和俱乐部的情景，我则说唱飞车追逐和枪战的情景。

sentences.en: She rapped the table with her pen.
sentences.cn: 她用笔笃笃地敲桌子。

sentences.en: She was woken by a sharp rap on the door.
sentences.cn: 她被一阵急促的敲门声惊醒。

sentences.en: The rap against Conn was that he was far too reckless.
sentences.cn: 科恩被人们认为做事太不计后果。

sentences.en: The rap on this guy is that he doesn't really care.
sentences.cn: 这家伙据说并不怎么在乎。

sentences.en: The remark earned him a rap on the knuckles.
sentences.cn: 那番话使他受到了指责。

sentences.en: There was a sharp rap on the door.
sentences.cn: 有人在重重地急促敲门。

sentences.en: They were kissing each other rap-turously.
sentences.cn: 他们正在激吻。

sentences.en: Timeshare companies also come in for a rap as they continue to flout the rules.
sentences.cn: 各分时度假公司也受到了批评，因为他们一直违反相关规则。

sentences.en: We rap the manufacturers on their knuckles if the toy is shoddy.
sentences.cn: 如果玩具质量低劣，我们会痛斥制造商。

sentences.en: You'll be facing a Federal rap for aiding and abetting an escaped convict.
sentences.cn: 因涉嫌协助和教唆越狱囚犯，你将面临联邦指控。

to say the words of a rap song
